familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Rent or Royalties income from 570 WEST MT. PLEASANT ASSOCIATES, LLC (Residential Real Estate in Livingston, NJ) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: 570 West Mt. Pleasant Associates, LLC (Residential Real Estate In Livingston, NJ)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Managing Member of 570 West Mount Pleasant Associates, LLC from Jan 1, 2012, to Jan 1, 2017. Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Rent or Royalties income from 570 WEST MT. PLEASANT ASSOCIATES, LLC (Residential Real Estate in Livingston, NJ) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. Because his interest in this entity reportedly has been divested, it is marked in this database as a resolved potential conflict of interest.
Jared Kushner served as President of 570 West Mount Pleasant Realty Corp. (Residential Real Estate in Livingston, NJ) from Jan 1, 2012, to Jan 1, 2017.
familyMemberEthics.business: 570 West Mount Pleasant Realty Corp. (Residential Real Estate In Livingston, NJ)
